CustomField.description: Keep formula simple if you will would want to report on days since the docket. Otherwise filter out days since docket and the following actions have not occurred. IF (ISBLANK(X546_date_mailed__c)&& ISBLANK(X563_date_mailed__c), today()- Date_of_Docket__c , 0)
CustomField.label: Days Since Docket
